name: El Silbon
description:
Thank you for consider El Silbon. 

Right now all that has been created is the tutorial.  Small changes, modification, and Dialog may change.  There will only be four story's taking place in different place's and times in history.  Please take in consideration that there will be more then jump scars some parts of the story may disturb some player.    

El Silbon is a horror game that focuses on two  folklore creatures and two  legendary creature  from around the world.  Also one well know demon witch inspired a famous movie.  I'll be focusing on their story's as much as possible.  El Silbon a folklore around to 19th century in Colombia and Venezuela. Krampus a creature of folklore in Germany.   Morbi the legendary creature in Italy that brings pestilence and disease.  Nosoi the legendary creature in Rome also a brings disease and pestilence but is also know to be the keeper of Pandora's box.  

Other then the normal scars,  Their will be what some mite say to be Dark and terrifying.   Not for children.
